alert.note: Alert for Morgan (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 28 at 3:39PM CDT until July 28 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of east Tennessee, including the following counties, Anderson, Morgan and Scott. * WHEN...Until 845 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 439 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Up to 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Wartburg, Oliver Springs, Huntsville, Helenwood, Harriman, Sunbright, Oakdale, Frozen Head State Park, Slick Rock, Elgin, Petros, Robbins, Deerlodge, Rugby State Park, Coalfield, Rugby, Rosedale, Pine Orchard, Smokey Junction and Norma. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
